Text: E̩gba kʼIfraim ko̩la, i mud o̩la ega;
Fai taku ma dure ño̩ dure tule,
alu kʼoko ije̩-ma de̩, abe̩le̩ efu-ma ko̩,
Todule̩ omi la dab idu ñw ama,
Nade kpʼama dab ibe̩a ku ma kʼamo̩ma-wñ kpa,
E̩wñ ki kpʼe̩ bie̩ de̩, O̩ Israe̩l;
Ugbo onu-we̩ de̩ fa-i kʼi agbʼe̩ ef ewo ewo-we̩ chaka?
Omi mʼonu du ñw e̩ ef uwe̩do̩-mi,
Ma fʼudu kʼIfraim fe̩ ji te̩,
E̩do̩dudu onobule̩ kʼi achefu abʼo ma
Nala ma tane̩ bʼo̩wo̩ o̩jegu te̩?
